refnamediv.refpurpose: Converts a MIME message to a signed S/MIME message

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Converts a MIME message to a signed S/MIME message.

refsect2.title: signer_CA_certs
refsect2.para: Array of strings of CA Certificates

row.entry: add a text/plain content type MIME header
do not put the signer_CA_certs into the generated PKCS7 signature
do not canonize the line endings to CR/LF
Do not include attributes (signing time, supported symmetric algorithms, etc.)

refsect1.title: Return Types
refsect1.para: This function takes a message and converts it to an S/MIME signed message based on the flags value (if supplied - default PKCS7_DETACHED).

example.title: Signing a MIME Message
example.para: Example (where signed.eml contains the output from smime_sign.
example.programlisting:
select smime_sign ('just a test', file_to_string ('thwate_pub.pem'), file_to_string ('thwate_pri.pem'), 'very_secret_password', vector (file_to_string ('thwate_ca.pem')), 4*16 + 1);
